content: this is a quick and fun pattern for a striped cotton dishtowel you will need 3 5 50g balls of kitchen cotton for the main color and about half of a 50g ball for the contrast color want to make a quick utilitarian dishtowel to go with this then check out the totally utilitarian towel 1 can also be found in the crochet calendar 2010 on feb 26th **update 12/2/09 pattern has been reformatted please feel free to download new version ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/total-utilitarian-dishtowel
